overview: In 2003 this animated  video  of  four adorable singing tough-skinned terrestrial mollusks went viral.  If  you  listen closely  you’ll  probably  be  able  to recognize the audio by a pretty famous quartet from a rather iconic movie.This is one where you should open up all  the  windows,  “crank  up”  the volume,  and  let  yourself  FEEL  the strength  of  these  voices  while  you enjoy the visual eye candy.
tagline: If you like barbershop quartet music and garden snails (and who doesn't) Then this one's for you.
title: Sincere Slugs
